Text: Sorry, was AFK - got it up and running again. Still some probs with upload speed, so please be patient ;)...

FYI:

I couldn't find any XviD - version with the OAR (Original Aspect Ratio) anywhere.
So I decided to get all the 1280*720 BiA.mkv files from elsewhere and convert my own XviD version of the Season.
It is now as stated in the description in Xvid/MP3 at 720*304 size.
Enjoy ;)!
I'd say it's decent quality, but feel free to comment.

Episodes 17-20 have hardcoded subs (eng) - I am sorry!
Will upload them separately without the subs...

Due to the standard set to ''subtitles switched on'' in the source mkv files, the previous release came out with episodes 17-20 having hardcoded subtitles.
I fixed it.
https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6295176
